refsect1.title: Known Implementations
refsect1.para: GooCanvasItemModel is implemented by GooCanvasRectModel, GooCanvasEllipseModel, GooCanvasPolylineModel, GooCanvasTableModel, GooCanvasItemModelSimple, GooCanvasTextModel, GooCanvasPathModel, GooCanvasImageModel and GooCanvasGroupModel.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GooCanvasItemModel defines the interface that models for canvas items must implement, and contains methods for operating on canvas item models.

refsect2.title: GooCanvasItemModel
refsect2.para: GooCanvasItemModel is a typedef used for objects that implement the GooCanvasItemModel interface.
(There is no actual GooCanvasItemModel struct, since it is only an interface. But using 'GooCanvasItemModel' is more helpful than using 'GObject'.)

refsect2.title: GooCanvasItemModelIface
refsect2.para: GooCanvasItemModelIFace holds the virtual methods that make up the GooCanvasItemModel interface.
Simple item models only need to implement the get_parent(), set_parent() and create_item() methods.
Items that support transforms should also implement get_transform() and set_transform(). Items that support styles should implement get_style() and set_style().

Container items must implement get_n_children() and get_child(). Containers that support dynamic changes to their children should implement add_child(), move_child() and remove_child(). Layout containers like GooCanvasTable may implement get_child_property() and set_child_property().

refsect2.title: The "can-focus" property
refsect2.para: If the item can take the keyboard focus.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "description" property
refsect2.para: A description of the item for use by assistive technologies.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "parent" property
refsect2.para: The parent item model.

refsect2.title: The "pointer-events" property
refsect2.para: Specifies when the item receives pointer events.
Default value: GOO_CANVAS_EVENTS_VISIBLE_MASK|GOO_CANVAS_EVENTS_PAINTED_MASK|GOO_CANVAS_EVENTS_FILL_MASK|GOO_CANVAS_EVENTS_STROKE_MASK

refsect2.title: The "title" property
refsect2.para: A short context-rich description of the item for use by assistive technologies.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "transform" property
refsect2.para: The transformation matrix of the item.

refsect2.title: The "visibility" property
refsect2.para: When the canvas item is visible.
Default value: GOO_CANVAS_ITEM_VISIBLE

refsect2.title: The "visibility-threshold" property
refsect2.para: The scale threshold at which the item becomes visible.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 0
